author: rcmatthews
msg: Removed the recently added DomainObjectInjector and moved the responsibilty to the object loader I/F.  The reflector project now provides the final implementation of the loader, which knows about the container, and now does the injecting of the container into the domain objects.

author: rcmatthews
msg: Removed AdapterFactory; adapters are now created by the reflector and not via the object loader.

author: rcmatthews
msg: Replaced ObjectFactory with a simpler interface for specifically setting up existing domain objects - DomainObjectInjector.
